duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee kitchen operations and ensure high quality food preparation and presentation.
Create and plan menus, considering factors such as budget, dietary needs, and seasonal availability.
Manage kitchen staff, including hiring, training, and scheduling.
Monitor inventory and order supplies to maintain adequate stock levels.
Maintain a clean and organized kitchen environment, adhering to safety and sanitation guidelines.
Collaborate with restaurant management to ensure seamless food service and customer satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Culinary Degree or Certification from a recognized culinary institution
